import React from 'react';
import {
  List,
  Edit,
  Create,
  Datagrid,
  TextField,
  ReferenceField,
  EditButton,
  SimpleForm,
  TextInput,
  ReferenceInput,
  SelectInput
} from 'react-admin';

export const InstructionList = props => (
  <List {...props}>
    <Datagrid>
      <TextField source="instruction" />
      <ReferenceField label="Group" source="group.id" reference="groups">
        <TextField source="name" />
      </ReferenceField>
      <TextField label="Score 1" source="first" />
      <TextField label="Score 2" source="second" />
      <TextField label="Score 3" source="third" />
      <TextField label="Score 4" source="fourth" />
      <TextField label="Score 5" source="fifth" />
      <EditButton />
    </Datagrid>
  </List>
);

export const InstructionCreate = props => (
  <Create {...props}>
    <SimpleForm redirect="/instructions">
      <TextInput source="instruction" />
      <ReferenceInput label="Group" source="group.id" reference="groups">
        <SelectInput optionText="name" />
      </ReferenceInput>
      <TextInput label="Score 1" source="first" />
      <TextInput label="Score 2" source="second" />
      <TextInput label="Score 3" source="third" />
      <TextInput label="Score 4" source="fourth" />
      <TextInput label="Score 5" source="fifth" />
    </SimpleForm>
  </Create>
);

export const InstructionEdit = props => (
  <Edit {...props}>
    <SimpleForm redirect="/instructions">
      <TextInput source="instruction" />
      <ReferenceInput label="Group" source="group.id" reference="groups">
        <SelectInput optionText="name" />
      </ReferenceInput>
      <TextInput label="Score 1" source="first" />
      <TextInput label="Score 2" source="second" />
      <TextInput label="Score 3" source="third" />
      <TextInput label="Score 4" source="fourth" />
      <TextInput label="Score 5" source="fifth" />
    </SimpleForm>
  </Edit>
);
